import 'react-app-polyfill/ie11'; import 'react-app-polyfill/stable'; import React from "react"; import { Card, CardHeader, CardBody, CardTitle, Row, Col } from "reactstrap"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; // core components_chart 입력하는 부분_ // 아래에 차트 이름과, 차트 경로를 입력하면 된다. import chartData from "../../variables/charts.js"; import ReactFC from 'react-fusioncharts'; import ReactFusioncharts from "react-fusioncharts"; import FusionCharts from 'fusioncharts'; import charts from 'fusioncharts/fusioncharts.charts'; import Zoomline from "fusioncharts/fusioncharts.zoomline"; import FusionTheme from 'fusioncharts/themes/fusioncharts.theme.fusion'; ReactFC.fcRoot(FusionCharts, charts, Zoomline, FusionTheme); charts(FusionCharts); let dataSource = new Array(); let url = [ "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/block-size/sum/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/block-size/average/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/block-size/total/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/difficulty/value/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/medianconfirmationtime/value/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/mining-revenue/value/month", "http://bcmon.kmu.ac.kr/bitcoin/graphs/total-revenue/value/month" ]; var tag = [ "sum_size_per_day", "avg_size_per_day", "accumulated_size_per_day", "difficulty_per_day", "medianconfirmationtime_per_day", "miningRevenue_per_day", "totalRevenue_per_day" ]; var title = [ "Sum of Block Size per Day", "Average of Block Size per Day", "Total Block Size per Day", "Daily Difficulty", "Daily Median confirmation Time", "Mining Revenue per Day", "Total Mining Revenue per Day" ]; var caption = [ "Sum of daily block Size in bitcoin network.", "Average of daily block Size in bitcoin network.", "Total block size until now in bitcoin network.", "Daily difficulty for create block in bitcoin network.", "To spent time of median confirmation per day in bitcoin network.", "Reward for result of mining per day in bitcoin network.", "Total reward for result of mining per day in bitcoin network." ]; class bitcoinBlock extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { bigChartData: "data1" }; } setBgChartData = name => { this.setState({ bigChartData: name }); }; render() { for(var i = 0; i < url.length; i++) { dataSource[i] = chartData.renderGraph(url[i], tag[i], title[i], caption[i], i); console.log("임시 데이터 1 - " + i + " : "); console.log(JSON.stringify(dataSource[i])); } return ( <>

Block

.

); } } export default bitcoinBlock;
